snippet: In Houston for a benefit in 1989, Mr. Trump, then a real estate developer, had the ear of the fallen president for two days. Former Gov. John B. Connally of Texas and his wife helped bring them together....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump spent two days in company of Pres Richard M Nixon during 1989 birthday celebration for Texas Gov John B Connally and his wife Nellie, in Houston; event was one of Nixon's appearances in public following his resignation over Watergate in 1974, and was one of first glimpses of Trump's fascination with Nixon.
lead_paragraph: In Houston for a benefit in 1989, Mr. Trump, then a real estate developer, had the ear of the fallen president for two days. Former Gov. John B. Connally of Texas and his wife helped bring them together.

headline.main: When Donald Trump Partied With Richard Nixon
headline.print_headline: The Saturday Night in ’89 When Trump Partied With Nixon
